mapper.sql: SELECT ts.shop_id as shop_id, ts.owner_id as owner_id, tpi.name as user_name, ts.area_id as area_id, ta.area_name as area_name, ts.shop_categoery_id as shop_categoery_id, thc.shop_categoery_name as shop_categoery_name, ts.shop_name as shop_name, ts.shop_desc as shop_desc, ts.shop_addr as shop_addr, ts.phone as phone, ts.shop_img as shop_img, ts.priority as priority, ts.create_time as create_time, ts.last_edit_time as last_edit_time, ts.enable_status as enable_status, ts.advice as advice FROM tb_shop ts
mapper.select: LEFT JOIN tb_person_info tpi ON ts.owner_id=tpi.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_area ta ON ts.area_id=ta.area_id LEFT JOIN tb_shop_categoery thc ON ts.shop_categoery_id=thc.shop_categoery_id WHERE ts.shop_id=#{shopId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shop ( owner_id, area_id, shop_categoery_id, shop_name, shop_desc, shop_addr, phone, shop_img, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, advice ) VALUES( #{owner.userId}, #{area.areaId}, #{shopCategoery.shopCategoeryId}, #{shopName}, #{shopDesc}, #{shopAddr}, #{phone}, #{shopImg}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, /*now(), now(),*/ #{enableStatus}, #{advice})
mapper.select: SELECT t1.product_id, t1.product_name, t1.priority, t1.enable_status FROM tb_product t1 WHERE t1.shop_id=#{shopId} ORDER BY t1.enable_status,t1.priority ASC
